
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Cheeseburger_Corollary_1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int test = sc.nextInt();
		while (test > 0) {
			int sing = sc.nextInt();
			int dou = sc.nextInt();
			int K = sc.nextInt();
			isitpossible(sing, dou, K);
			test--;
		}
	}

	public static void isitpossible(int single, int doub, int K) {
		int Bun = (single + doub) * 2;
		int Bread = single + doub * 2;

		if (Bun >= K + 1 && Bread >= K) {
			System.out.println("Yes");
		} else {
			System.out.println("No");
		}
	}

}
